forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 59F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 7C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 44F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 53F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 53F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 51F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 46F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High near 55F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 54F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.
